DiscordServer.SQL: SELECT * FROM discordserver WHERE languageid IS NULL OR languageid = ? AND serverid IS NULL OR serverid = ?
UPDATE discordserver SET languageid = COALESCE(?, languageid) WHERE serverid = ?

DiscordServerSettings.SQL: SELECT * FROM discordserversettings WHERE serverid IS NULL OR serverid = ? AND prefix IS NULL OR prefix = ? AND volume IS NULL OR volume = ?
UPDATE discordserversettings SET volume = COALESCE(?, volume), prefix = COALESCE(?, prefix) WHERE serverid = ?
